wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Wilde, 1st Baron Truro,  (7 July 1782 – 11 November 1855) was a British lawyer, judge and politician. He was Lord High Chancellor of Great Britain between 1850 and 1852.

response: * Thomas Wilde, 1st Baron Truro, owner of Truro House.
